definitions.definition: The study of the origin , and sometimes the development , of the universe or the solar system , in astrophysics , religion , and other fields.
Any specific theory , model , myth , or other account of the origin of the universe.

main_definition: The study of the origin , and sometimes the development , of the universe or the solar system , in astrophysics , religion , and other fields.
secondary_definitions: Any specific theory , model , myth , or other account of the origin of the universe.
